text: Danièle Hoffman-Rispal (22 June 1951 – 16 April 2020) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She represented the city of Paris, and was a member of the parliamentary group Groupe Socialiste, républicain et citoyen (SRC). She died on 16 April 2020, aged 68. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians Category:French Jews Category:Jewish French politicians
title: Danièle Hoffman-Rispal
